meanings.definition: Covered or protected from direct sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The picnic area was nice and shaded under the big tree.
meanings.sent2: The house looked cool and shaded with its awnings down.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a shaded spot to nap away from the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: Her shaded glasses made the world seem like a secret garden.
meanings.sent5: The shaded forest was a peaceful retreat from the bright city.

meanings.definition: Having a darker color in certain areas.
meanings.sent1: The painting had shaded corners that added depth to the scene.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was shaded with highlights that shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent3: The shaded wall made the room feel cozy and intimate.
meanings.sent4: His shaded expression hinted at hidden thoughts beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The shaded sky at dusk painted the world in hues of purple and gold.

meanings.definition: Represented with shading in a drawing or painting.
meanings.sent1: The artist skillfully shaded the portrait to capture the subject's likeness.
meanings.sent2: The shaded areas in the landscape painting added realism to the scene.
meanings.sent3: The shaded figure in the artwork seemed to come alive with each stroke.
meanings.sent4: The shaded background created a sense of depth in the illustration.
meanings.sent5: The shaded details in the sketch brought out the beauty of the subject.
